careers.title: Careers
careers.subtitle: Join Our Team
careers.description: At Todd Agriscience, we're committed to advancing agricultural science and creating sustainable solutions for the future. We're always looking for talented individuals who share our passion for innovation and excellence.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.content: Work on cutting-edge agricultural technologies that make a real difference in the world.

growth.title: Professional Growth
growth.content: We invest in our employees' development through training, mentorship, and career advancement opportunities.

culture.title: Collaborative Culture
culture.content: Join a team of passionate professionals who work together to solve complex challenges.

impact.title: Global Impact
impact.content: Contribute to sustainable agriculture and food security on a global scale.

openPositions.title: Open Positions
openPositions.noPositions: We don't have any open positions at this time, but we're always interested in hearing from talented individuals. Please check back soon or reach out to us directly.
openPositions.checkBack: Check back regularly for new opportunities or contact us to express your interest in future openings.

howToApply.title: How to Apply
howToApply.content: Interested in joining our team? We'd love to hear from you. Please send your resume and cover letter to our HR department.
howToApply.contact: For career inquiries, please contact us through our contact page or email us directly.
